mapper.select: insert into bidding_content_bak(name,en_name,is_null,content_type_id,project_phase_id,version_num) SELECT name,en_name,is_null,content_type_id,project_phase_id ,version_num FROM bidding_content_settings where delflag='0' and project_phase_id=#{projectPhaseId}
select * from bidding_content_bak where project_phase_id=#{projectPhaseId} and version_num=#{versionNum}
